title: Are peanut allergies caused by peanut oil adjuvants in infant vaccines?
description: Answer (1 of 4): No. There are no peanut oil adjuvants in any human vaccine, infant or otherwise. This is a myth born of the fact that in the 1960s and early to mid 70s, Merck trialled a peanut-oil vaccine adjuvant (designation 65-4), and publications from those trials are still available in Pu...
